name: TorretaMataZombies 2
description:
TorretaMataZombies 2 is my first game  entirely developed by me. Is kind of simple since i just started to learn programming and didn´t want to have any tough developement. I´ve developed it in 2 months.

Both scripts and graphics are made by me, the sound effects are downloaded from freesound.org and fixed by me, and the music comes from a unity free asset (Metal Mayhem Music Pack).  Also used a glitch effec shader which is a free asset from Unity store.

if (uPlayIt)

               {

                              Hope u like it!;

               }
